casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 5, 2010

[Cite as 0110512010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-6.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-0950. Meccon, Inc. v. Univ. of Akron.

Franklin App. No. 08AP-727, 182 Ohio App.3d 85, 2009-Ohio-1700. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for admission pro hac vice of Emily Sehlesinger by Benjamin C. Mizer,

It is ordered by the court that the motion for admission pro hac vice is granted.
